events.text: There are 3 houses and a kid playing outside.
You hear some footsteps in the snow when traveling to the abandoned facility.
You hear that?
I do, be careful.
A twig snaps and a shadow swiftly moves throwing something!
Get down!
You and your partner smash into the snow and 4 knives made out of sharpened office supplies stand in front of your face!
You’re both human...What are you doing here?
A woman wearing a tattered lab coat with additional knives in her pockets blocks the path.
We’re trying to help this town, but everyone seems on edge to outsiders.
I promise we aren’t the enemy here.
That’s right.
We’re part of an organization named Gaia’s Advocates.
We’re trying to stop the freezing of the planet by reactivating the nuclear plant here.
Even if that was possible.
Which I highly doubt.
The military group set up outside of the plant won’t let you or your advocates in.
They’re saying it’s too dangerous to restart the plant.
What do you think?
I see you're wearing a lab coat and I’m sure that’s not just for decoration.
One plant wouldn’t be enough to defrost the entire planet...
Right, we agree. Right?
Leo nudges your elbow
Yes,, one wouldn’t be enough.
It might help those here locally, which is what we want to do, but it doesn’t help the nation or the planet.
Of course, it wouldn’t be! It just wouldn’t be enough!
Leo’s respect for you has risen.
But if your group can restart multiple plants and circulate the energy it might be possible…
That’s what our plan is.
We’re traveling across the nation hoping that we can do just that and we’re starting here first.
I want to help you both, but I have people I must protect here.
I’m sorry, but I wish you the best of luck on your mission.
Wait a sec!
Hm?
